title: Add chiSquareDataSet Stream Evaluator
description:
This ticket adds the chiSquareDataSet Stream Evaluator which performs a Chi Square "goodness of fit test" on two sets of binned counted data.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chi-squared_test

comments.content:
I left the ticket off the commit. The commit to master is:
https://github.com/apache/lucene-solr/commit/1cc49d18c2eae0b2034ef74607ed65496b11bf6a
